activities.name: Copy data1
activities.description: copying customer from Cloud ot local

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryAzureSqlTable5
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UserQueryAzureSqlTable5
